structuralFindings.rationale: Lowe's has a clear hybrid structure: (1) Lowe's Innovation Labs in Kirkland, WA handles long-horizon exploration (spatial computing, digital twins, Vision Pro), (2) an AI Transformation Office drives enterprise-wide adoption and governance, (3) a central Charlotte Tech Hub houses 2,000 tech associates as a 'center of excellence', and (4) embedded teams deploy AI into stores (Mylow Companion on Zebra devices). This hub-and-spoke model has central standards via the Transformation Office but distributed execution across Innovation Labs, engineering, and store operations.
structuralFindings.aiTeamStructure: Multi-layered structure: (1) Lowe's Innovation Labs (Kirkland, WA) - exploration arm exploring spatial computing, AI, digital twins; subsidiary-like independence. (2) AI Transformation Office - governance body that vets use cases on ROI, tech investment, business readiness, brand risk. (3) Charlotte Tech Hub - 'center of excellence' for up to 2,000 tech associates. (4) Core AI/Data team under SVP Chandhu Nair focused on platform and scaling. CIO Seemantini Godbole oversees digital strategy; Nair reports into tech organization. Partnership with OpenAI provides foundational LLM capabilities.

structuralFindings.investmentSignals: Enterprise-scale AI adoption evidenced by: 100-billion-token milestone with OpenAI (recognized by OpenAI with award); Charlotte Tech Hub designed for 2,000 tech associates; Mylow handling ~1 million questions/month; partnership with OpenAI predating ChatGPT by nearly a year. Digital Commerce 360 projects $12.17B in ecommerce sales for 2025 (Lowe's ranks #11 among North American online retailers). No specific AI budget disclosed but multiple GenAI tools in production across customer-facing, associate-facing, and engineering use cases.

observableMarkers.reportingStructure: Chandhu Nair (SVP AI, Data, Innovation) sits in tech organization; Seemantini Godbole (CDIO) reports to CEO. AI Transformation Office provides cross-functional governance. Innovation Labs operates as semi-independent subsidiary in Kirkland, WA.
observableMarkers.resourceAllocation: Charlotte Tech Hub is dedicated facility with up to 2,000 tech roles; Innovation Labs is separate Kirkland facility; explicit investment in OpenAI partnership infrastructure. Multiple pilots running simultaneously (14 stores for ChatGPT-style tool, 50 stores for dwell alerts).
observableMarkers.timeHorizons: Mixed: Innovation Labs works on 2-5 year horizon (Vision Pro, digital twins, spatial commerce); AI Transformation Office works quarterly to annual cadence; store rollouts measured in months (Style Your Space launched Sept, expanding through 2025-2026).
observableMarkers.decisionRights: Centralized governance through AI Transformation Office with four-metric framework (ROI, tech investment, business readiness, brand/reputation risk). Distributed execution to Innovation Labs for exploration, engineering for internal tools, and store ops for associate-facing tools.
observableMarkers.metrics: Leading indicators: adoption rates, daily usage, weekly active users, feedback metrics. Lagging indicators: revenue growth, conversion uplift. Specific KPIs mentioned: 80% accuracy target for associate tool (aiming for 85-90%); 2x conversion when customers engage Mylow; 200 basis point improvement in CSAT with in-store Mylow Companion; double-digit productivity gains from GenAI in code review.

summary: Lowe's has built a sophisticated hybrid/hub-and-spoke AI structure with multiple specialized units: Lowe's Innovation Labs (Kirkland, WA) handles long-horizon exploration in spatial computing and digital twins, an AI Transformation Office provides centralized governance using a four-metric vetting framework, a Charlotte Tech Hub serves as a center of excellence for up to 2,000 tech roles, and SVP Chandhu Nair leads the AI/Data platform team that abstracts complexity for developers across the enterprise. Under CEO Marvin Ellison and CDIO Seemantini Godbole, Lowe's has achieved enterprise-scale AI adoption (100-billion-token OpenAI milestone), with Mylow handling nearly 1 million customer questions monthly and driving 2x conversion rates online and 200 basis point CSAT improvements in stores.
